issue.title: URDF parser fails if two consecutive fixed joints are present in the model.

content.raw:
Hi @scpeters , 
      I am affected by this bug on a project and I would be happy to continue your work fixing this bug, starting from #!/osrf/sdformat/commits/bec67123f1b0 . 
      It would be convenient for me if this fix was released for a Gazebo 7 or 8 . Do you know if there is any minor release already planned for the near future, so I can plan the timing of the fix? Thanks a lot.
content.html: Hi @scpeters , I am affected by this bug on a project and I would be happy to continue your work fixing this bug, starting from #!/osrf/sdformat/commits/bec67123f1b0 . It would be convenient for me if this fix was released for a Gazebo 7 or 8 . Do you know if there is any minor release already planned for the near future, so I can plan the timing of the fix? Thanks a lot.
